H0.text: who explored waters of cuba the bahamas and hispaniola. Vasco Nunez de Balboa

H1.text: who explored waters of cuba the bahamas and hispaniola. Juan Ponce de Leon

H2.text: who explored waters of cuba the bahamas and hispaniola. Hernando Cortes

H3.text: who explored waters of cuba the bahamas and hispaniola. Christopher Columbus

A4.text: His landing place was an island in the Bahamas, known by its native inhabitants as Guanahani.

A5.text: He then visited the islands now known as Cuba and Hispaniola, establishing a colony in what is now Haiti.
